related_questions.question:
Write down the generic structure of the text about!

bantuin woi​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Generic Structure of Descriptive Text : Identification, Description

Penjelasan:

# Identification: (contains about the introduction of a person, place, animal or object will be described.)

# Description: contains a description of something such as animal, things, place or person by describing its features, forms, colors, or anything related to what the writer describe.

Jawaban:

Orientation

A mobile phone - portable radio telephone

Event

The first mobile phone - in japan

General classification

A cell phone combines - wireless communication

Description

Paragraph 2-3 is a descriptiom about phone

related_questions.question:
Buatlah tentang benda, binatang, orang atau tempat ( participant secara umum)    Lebih disukai yg terkait dengan teknologi. 
Kalau yg dibicarakan benda lebih menyoroti fungsi benda tsb. (yang pembuatannya merujuk dengan Report text)

□Bhs.inggris□​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

I have a smartphone. It is one of many sophisticated things that I've ever had. I use my smartphone to communicate with my family and friends. I don't have any game apps in my smartphone because I don't like to play games with my smartphone. I just like to watch youtube videos and tik tok videos on my smartphone. I also use my smartphone to communicate with google assistant. I enjoy communicating with that artificial intelligence because it's really cool! I can also practice speaking English with my google assistant. I feel happy to have my smartphone. Thank you.

Penjelasan:

Aku memiliki sebuah telepon pintar. Telpon pintarku adalah salah satu dari banyak hal canggih yang pernah kumiliki. Aku menggunakan smartphoneku untuk berkomunikasi dengan keluarga dan teman-temanku. Aku tidak memiliki aplikasi game di smartphoneku karena aku tidak suka bermain game dengan smartphoneku. Aku hanya suka menonton video youtube dan video tik tok di smartphoneku. Aku juga menggunakan smartphoneku untuk berkomunikasi dengan google asisten. Aku senang berkomunikasi dengan kecerdasan buatan tersebut karena sangat keren! Aku juga bisa berlatih berbicara bahasa Inggris dengan google asistenku. Aku merasa senang memiliki smartphoneku. Terima kasih.

Semoga membantu ya.

related_questions.question:
This text is for question numbers 14-17    My Neighbour
Mr. And Mrs. Ruslan are my neighbors. They have two children,
a son and a daughter. Their names are Fahril and Mayada. Mr. Ruslan is a lecturer in
a state university in our town. Mrs. Ruslanis a house wife. She likes cooking many kinds
of food. She often invites me to cook together in her kitchen. Mr. Ruslan's family has some
pets. There are some birds, a cat and two rabits. I sometimes feed them. I like guing there
because they are kind and friendly. They always show good attitude to everyone.
14. Does Ruslan's family live far from the writer's house?
a. Yes, they do
c. Yes, it does
b. No, they do not
d. No, it doesn't
15. Where does Mr. Ruslan work? He works in a.....
a. University
c. kitchen
b. school
d. company
16. I sometimes feed them. The underlined word means.......
a. ask food to somebody or something
b.give food to somebody or something
C. eat food with somebody
d. take food froom somebody
17. " she ofteninvites me to cook together in her kitchen."The word "me" refers to.....
a, the teacher
c. Mayada
c. the writer
d. Mr. Ruslan​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

14. b

15. a

16. b

17. c

Penjelasan:

i'm not sure about number 14, i'm sorry

D. Australian (at sentence number 4 pargraph 1)

B. Tania (sentence number 3 paragraph 3)

C. Tall and handsome (sentence number 5 paragraph 2)

D. Five, they are Mom, Dad, Amanda, Bryan, and Tania.
